contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=November 2011}} {{Redirect|Okhotsk region|the settlement in Russia|Okhotsk}} {{Infobox settlement |name = Okhotsk Subprefecture |native_name = オホーツク総合振興局 |official_name = |image_map = Abashiri Subprefecture.png |seat = [[Abashiri, Hokkaido|Abashiri]] |seat_type = Capital |subdivision_type = Prefecture |subdivision_name = [[Hokkaido]] |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 10690.09 |area_footnotes = |population_total = 309487 |population_as_of = September 30, 2010 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_density_km2 = auto }} {{nihongo|'''Okhotsk Subprefecture'''|オホーツク総合振興局|Ohōtsuku-sōgō-shinkō-kyoku}} is a [[Subprefectures in Hokkaido|subprefecture]] of [[Hokkaido]], Japan. It was renamed from the earlier Abashiri Subprefecture on April 1, 2010. Abashiri Subprefecture was established in 1897. ==Etymology== Abashiri Prefecture was named after the subprefectural office in [[Abashiri, Hokkaido|Abashiri]]. However, the area was more commonly referred to as the {{nihongo|Okhotsk region|オホーツク地方|Ohōtsuku-chihō}}, as it faces the [[Sea of Okhotsk]], and the name Abashiri was changed to the more commonly used Okhotsk during the administrative redivision of Hokkaido's 14 subprefectures to 9 subprefectural bureaus in April, 2010. ==Geography== [[File:Abashiri Subprefecture Map.gif|thumb|300px|Okhotsk Subprefecture]] ===Cities=== * [[Abashiri, Hokkaido|Abashiri]] (capital) * [[Kitami, Hokkaido|Kitami]] * [[Monbetsu, Hokkaido|Monbetsu]] ===Towns and villages by district=== *[[Abashiri District, Hokkaido|Abashiri District]] ** [[Bihoro, Hokkaido|Bihoro]] ** [[Ōzora, Hokkaido|Ōzora]] ** [[Tsubetsu, Hokkaido|Tsubetsu]] *[[Monbetsu District, Hokkaido|Monbetsu District]] ** [[Engaru, Hokkaido|Engaru]] ** [[Nishiokoppe, Hokkaido|Nishiokoppe]] ** [[Okoppe, Hokkaido|Okoppe]] ** [[Ōmu, Hokkaido|Ōmu]] ** [[Takinoue, Hokkaido|Takinoue]] ** [[Yūbetsu, Hokkaido|Yūbetsu]] *[[Shari District]] ** [[Kiyosato, Hokkaido|Kiyosato]] ** [[Koshimizu, Hokkaido|Koshimizu]] ** [[Shari, Hokkaido|Shari]] *[[Tokoro District, Hokkaido|Tokoro District]] ** [[Kunneppu, Hokkaido|Kunneppu]] ** [[Oketo, Hokkaido|Oketo]] ** [[Saroma, Hokkaido|Saroma]] ===Mergers=== See [[List of mergers in Hokkaido#Okhotsk Subprefecture]]. ==External links== * {{Official website|http://www.okhotsk.pref.hokkaido.lg.jp}} {{ja icon}} {{coord|44.026559|144.260889|format=dms|display=inline,title|type:city_region:JP_scale:100000}} {{Hokkaido}} [[Category:Subprefectures in Hokkaido]] [[Category:2010 establishments in Japan]]
